name: Jacobsthal sequence (or Jacobsthal numbers): a(n) = a(n-1) + 2*a(n-2), with a(0) = 0, a(1) = 1; also a(n) = nearest integer to 2^n/3

specification: {B = Sequence(E,1 <= card), C = Sequence(Z,1 <= card), E = Prod(C,Z), S = Sequence(B,1 <= card)}
